content: hiya hope you enjoy this free pattern i would really appreciate it if you tagged me when posting on social media @melzcrochet this pattern is for personal use only please do not sell my pattern as your own of course you are free to sell anything made from this pattern have fun and crochet away this pattern is worked in continuous rnds use a stitch marker to mark the beginning of your rnds do not join also gauge is completely up to preference there are three 3 video tutorials in this pdf materials yarn parfait chunky - main colour and accent colour hook 4 00mm stitch marker yarn needle scissors felt eyes or safety eyes note if you wish to use worsted weight use a 4 00mm hook and 12mm safety eyes
